resources.string:
• Free High Speed Internet (WiFi).
• Free breakfast.
• Rooftop terrace.
• Private balcony.
• Baggage storage.
• Flat-screen TV.
• Safety.

If you’re looking for a charming hotel in Essaouira, look no further than Hotel Riad Nakhla.

While staying at Hotel Riad Nakhla, visitors can check out Dar Souiri (0.3 mi) and Mogador Christian Cemetery (0.3 mi), some of Essaouira's top attractions.

Hotel Riad Nakhla features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts free breakfast.

While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the seafood restaurants, including La Table by Madada, Triskala Café, and The Loft, all of which are a short distance from Hotel Riad Nakhla.

During your visit, be sure to check out Essaouira Ramparts (0.3 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.

The staff at Hotel Riad Nakhla looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
